entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Upsala
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Upsala 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this morning then falling slowly.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 this morning then falling slowly. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
